edges:
```yaml
edges:
  - from: Driver Creation
    to: Feature Consolidation
    attributes:
      driver_dev_table: "{bq_prefix}driver_dev"
      driver_oot_table: "{bq_prefix}driver_oot"
  - from: Feature Engineering
    to: Feature Consolidation
    attributes:
      final_table: "{bq_prefix}driver_consumer_base_gender"
  - from: Data Pulling
    to: Feature Consolidation
    attributes:
      data_loc: "gs://pypl-bkt-rsh-row-std-gds-pacman/user/chenzhao/prod/ql-store-rmr/data/ql_store_rmr_driver_simu_consumer_varmart"
  - from: Feature Consolidation
    to: Data Preprocessing
    attributes:
      export_uri: "gs://pypl-bkt-rsh-row-std-gds-pacman/user/chenzhao/prod/ql-store-rmr/data/ql_store_rmr_driver_dev_features/part*.parquet"
  - from: Data Preprocessing
    to: Model Training
    attributes:
      data_directory: "../data/ql_store_rmr_driver_dev_features_transformed"
  - from: Model Training
    to: Model Packaging
    attributes:
      tf_model_path: "../artifacts/{model_version}/19/exported_models/din_saved_model"
      categorical_feature_encoders_path: "../artifacts/{model_version}/exported_feature_transformer/categorical_feature_encoders"
      rcvr_id_tokenizer_path: "../artifacts/{model_version}/exported_feature_transformer/rcvr_id_tokenizer"
      numerical_feature_scalars_path: "../artifacts/{model_version}/exported_feature_transformer/numerical_feature_scalars"
  - from: Model Packaging
    to: Model Scoring
    attributes:
      exported_model_base: "/projects/gds-packman/apps/ql-store-recommendation-prod/research/artifacts/{model_version}/exported_models"
```
